TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapRpcMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapRpcMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapRpcMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定此方法往返傳送的 SOAP 訊息使用 格式。

span.span: Specifies that SOAP messages sent to and from the method use formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 定義為如何在 SOAP 訊息中格式化的 XML Web service 方法或作業的兩種樣式：`RPC`和`Document`。Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two styles for how an XML Web service method, or operation, can be formatted in a SOAP message: `RPC` and `Document`. `RPC` 格式化是指將根據 SOAP 規格，使用 SOAP rpc; 的作業亦稱為 SOAP 規格第 7 節。`RPC` formatting refers to formatting the operation according to the SOAP specification for using SOAP for RPC; otherwise known as Section 7 of the SOAP specification. `RPC` 格式設定的狀態的所有參數封裝在單一的 XML 項目，名為 XML Web service 方法之後和在該 XML 項目內的每個 XML 項目代表名為之後它代表參數的參數。`RPC` formatting states that all parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element named after the XML Web service method and that each XML element within that XML element represents a parameter named after the parameter it is representing. SOAP 訊息格式中都`RPC`並`Document`樣式可以用來與遠端程序呼叫 (RPC) 的方式，XML Web service 通訊不過`Document`樣式也很容易用於進行鬆散偶合的通訊方式。SOAP messages formatted in both the `RPC` and `Document` styles can be used to communicate with an XML Web service in a Remote Procedure Call (RPC) manner; however the `Document` style can also easily be used to communicate in a loosely coupled manner. 因此，`Document`建議樣式 XML Web 服務。Therefore, `Document` style XML Web services is recommended. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`Customizing SOAP Messages`主題。For more details, see the `Customizing SOAP Messages` topic. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 自訂 SOAP 訊息格式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100))。For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)). 這個屬性可以套用至 XML Web service 方法，在伺服器和用戶端上的 proxy 類別。This attribute can be applied to an XML Web service method on the server and a proxy class on the client. XML Web service 方法具有屬性設定為`true`不需要存取其。XML Web service methods that have the property set to `true` do not have access to their . 因此，存取任何的屬性類別傳回`null`。As such, accessing any of the properties of the class return `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將訊息樣式設定為`Rpc`針對`GetUserName`XML Web service 方法。The following code example sets the message style to `Rpc` for the `GetUserName` XML Web service method.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting all properties to their default values.

span.span: The intent of the SOAP request.
Sets the property.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property to the value of the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Action { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Action : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 要求的 HTTP 標頭欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: SOAP 要求的 HTTP 標頭欄位。

span.span: The HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: 預設值是http://tempuri.org/MethodName而 MethodName 是 XML Web service 方法的名稱。

span.span: The default is http://tempuri.org/MethodName where MethodName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，屬性是 URI，表示 SOAP 要求的意圖。Typically, the property is a URI indicating the intent of the SOAP request. 不過，SOAP 規格會將沒有限制的格式和 URI 是否參考現有的文件。However, the SOAP specification places no restrictions on the format and whether the URI refers to an existing document. 目前狀態和內容屬性可供網頁伺服器等防火牆，以便適當地篩選 SOAP 要求中 HTTP 的訊息。The presence and content of the property can be used by Web servers such as firewalls to appropriately filter SOAP request messages in HTTP. 根據預設，.NET Framework 1.1 版發行中的屬性`soapAction`屬性`soap:operation`為 XML Web service 產生的 WSDL 文件中支援 SOAP 繫結的每個項目。By default, the .NET Framework version 1.1 publishes the property in the `soapAction` attribute of the `soap:operation` element for each supported SOAP binding in WSDL documents generated for an XML Web service. 支援的 SOAP 繫結為 SOAP 1.1。The supported SOAP binding is SOAP 1.1. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) W3C 網站上的規格。For more information, see the [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) specification on the W3C website. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`http://www.contoso.com/Sample`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com/Sample`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Binding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Binding : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 方法實作作業的繫結。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding that an XML Web service method implements an operation for.

value.span: XML Web Service 方法實作作業的繫結。

span.span: The binding an XML Web service method implements an operation for.

value.span: 預設為附有 SOAP 的 XML Web Service 名稱。

span.span: The default is the name of the XML Web service with "Soap" appended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結所定義的 「 Web 服務描述語言 」 (WSDL) 是類似於介面，因為它會定義一組具體的作業。A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface in that it defines a concrete set of operations. 對於 ASP.NET 中，每個 XML Web service 方法會是繫結內的作業。With respect to ASP.NET, each XML Web service method is an operation within a binding. XML Web 服務方法都是 XML Web service 的預設繫結或繫結中指定的成員套用至 XML Web service。XML Web service methods are members of the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a applied to an XML Web service. 如果有多個 XML Web service 可以實作多個繫結，屬性套用至 XML Web service。An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings, if multiple attributes are applied to an XML Web service. 一次一或多個屬性套用至 XML Web service，或可以套用至個別的 XML Web 服務方法，以指出特定的 XML Web service 方法所實作的繫結作業。Once one or more attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a or can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method. 設定的屬性或來指定繫結，XML Web service 方法實作作業。Set the property of or to specify the binding an XML Web service method implements an operation for. 只有一個或可以套用至 XML Web service 方法。Only one or can be applied to an XML Web service method. 因此，對 XML Web service 方法只能實作一種繫結的作業。Therefore, an XML Web service method can only implement an operation for one binding. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作 XML Web service 內的多個繫結。The following code example demonstrates how to implement multiple bindings within an XML Web service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OneWay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OneWay : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 用戶端是否等候 Web 伺服器完成處理 XML Web Service 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing an XML Web service method.

value.span: 如果 XML Web Service 用戶端不會等候 Web 伺服器完整地處理 XML Web Service 方法，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the XML Web service client does not wait for the Web server to completely process an XML Web service method; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 XML Web service 方法具有屬性設定為`true`，XML Web service 用戶端不需要等候 Web 伺服器完成處理 XML Web service 方法。When an XML Web service method has the property set to `true`, the XML Web service client does not have to wait for the Web server to finish processing the XML Web service method. 只要 Web 伺服器已還原序列化，但是它會叫用 XML Web service 方法之前，伺服器會傳回 HTTP 202 狀態碼。As soon as the Web server has deserialized the , but before it invokes the XML Web service method, the server returns an HTTP 202 status code. HTTP 202 狀態碼會向用戶端指出 Web 伺服器已開始處理訊息。An HTTP 202 status code indicates to the client that the Web server has started processing the message. 因此，將 XML Web service 用戶端會收到任何 Web 伺服器已成功處理訊息的通知。Therefore, an XML Web service client receives no acknowledgment that the Web server successfully processed the message. 單向方法不能有傳回值，或任何`out`參數。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any `out` parameters. 如果您使用的.NET Framework 1.0 版 XML Web 服務方法有或屬性套用至它們屬性設定為`true`，不允許存取其使用靜態屬性。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 XML Web service methods that have either the or attribute applied to them with the property set to `true`, do not allow access to their using the static property. 若要存取，衍生類別實作 XML Web service 方法，從並存取屬性。To access the , derive the class implementing the XML Web service method from and access the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`true`。The following code example sets the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestElementName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.RequestElementName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 要求關聯的 XML 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 要求關聯的 XML 項目。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 預設值為 XML Web Service 方法的名稱。

span.span: The default value is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性已經過時。This property is obsolete. 它不會影響任何行為。It does not affect any behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`MyCustomRequestElement`。The following code example sets the property to `MyCustomRequestElement`.

summary.span: 取得或設定與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 要求關聯的 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 要求關聯的 XML 命名空間。

span.span: The XML namespace associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`http://www.contoso.com`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`.

summary.span: 取得或設定與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 回應關聯的 XML 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 要求關聯的 XML 項目。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 預設值是WebServiceNameResult，其中WebServiceName是 XML Web service 方法的名稱。

span.span: The default value is WebServiceNameResult, where WebServiceName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義用來封裝內的參數的 XML 項目`Body`SOAP 回應的項目。The property defines the XML element used to encapsulate the parameters within the `Body` element of the SOAP response. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`MyCustomResponseElement`。The following code example sets the property to `MyCustomResponseElement`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ResponseNamespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 回應關聯的 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 回應關聯的 XML 命名空間。

span.span: The XML namespace associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在 XSD 結構描述用於 XML Web service 方法，其服務描述中。The property is used in the XSD schema for the XML Web service method in its service description. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`http://www.contoso.com`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse Use { System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定叫用方法時使用的繫結。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding used when invoking the method.

value.span: 列舉型別的成員，指定叫用方法時使用的繫結。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the binding used when invoking the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設值為 。The default value of this property is .
